luckyMessage.title: Happy Lunar New Year 2021!
luckyMessage.1:
Tết đến xuân về, EcoOne chúc bạn và cả gia đình một năm mới an khang, thịnh vượng, luôn tràn đầy niềm vui, sức khoẻ và may mắn nhé!
Hôm nay lắc nhầm hộp rỗng mất rồi, EcoOne mời bạn quay lại app vào khung giờ 9h-13h hoặc 18h-22h hàng ngày để mình khui thêm lì xì nha!
luckyMessage.2:
Tết đến xuân về, EcoOne chẳng thích chúc gì cao xa, chỉ mong bạn luôn có những bữa ăn vui vẻ, bình an và mạnh khỏe bên gia đình và bạn bè bạn nhé!
Hôm nay lắc nhầm hộp rỗng mất rồi, EcoOne mời bạn quay lại app vào khung giờ 9h-13h hoặc 18h-22h hàng ngày để mình khui thêm lì xì nha!
luckyMessage.3:
Cám ơn bạn vì đã đồng hành cùng EcoOne trong năm vừa qua nhé.
Chúc bạn Tết này vẫn giống Tết xưa, vẫn vui vẻ vẫn bình an có thừa!
Hôm nay lắc nhầm hộp rỗng mất rồi, EcoOne mời bạn quay lại app vào khung giờ 9h-13h hoặc 18h-22h hàng ngày để mình khui thêm lì xì nha!

extendBusCard.noCardExtend: Your cards can not be extended through EcoOne now. Please come to extend your cards at the reception.

busCardVerificationScreen.primary: I am the owner of this card
busCardVerificationScreen.cardAddedMessage: Bus card has been successfully added!

busCardInformationScreen.contentRegistration:
- Residents of high-rise areas can register at receptions inside their respective buildings.
- Residents of low-rise areas can register at the respective Clubhouse. Pho Truc residents and all businesses in Ecopark can register at EcoPM Office - C1 Tower Rung Co.

Notes:
- Please receive your card and use Ecobus after 3-5 working days after completing the service registration.
- Only the owner of the bus card is entitled to use the card and enter the bus. If caught lending a card or using the card of another owner, the card will be revoked.
busCardInformationScreen.headerExtend: Extend and pay for Ecobus Service using EcoOne
busCardInformationScreen.contentExtend:
For combo bus cards:
- The expiry date of the combo card is from the renewal date. Buy more than 1 combo at once can only increase the number of turns left, but the expiration date. That means even if you buy five Combo 10, the expiry date for all swipes is still 6 months.
- Cannot use combo in case it is time or turn expired regardless the order they are:
  + In case the expiry date is over while you still have some turns left, those turn left will be reset to 0 next time when you come to expire the card.
  + In case the turn left is zero but the expired date is still available, the next expired date will be defined from the day you renew your cards.

For the monthly bus cards:
- The Ecobus monthly card will be renewed immediately after the customer renews and pays through the EcoOne application.
- For renewal and payment via the reception, please do before the 23rd of every month.
- Customers who register at any time of the month are also charged the same service fee as one (01) month.
busCardInformationScreen.instructionDetails: Please read the full service guideline [here]. For any questions, please contact EcoPM hotline: 02462664545 for support.

screen1.title: GO DIGITAL
screen1.text: Are you a resident or do you own a residence in Ecopark? Connecting with EcoID is a secure and easy way to get access to your resident information digitally!

screen2.title: SMART PAYMENTS
screen2.text: Using EcoID you can pay your bills and manage your household directly from within EcoOne. EcoID gives you access to view all your previous payments so that you never have to worry about keeping your receipts - we take care of the boring stuff.

screen3.title: STAY TUNED
screen3.text: As a resident you will soon be able to extend you - or your family’s - bus cards directly from EcoOne. Stay tuned for new updates and our resident only activities!
